title: Unexplained on why I can't login in troubles
body: Trying to get on my main accounts, but error, and now stuck on Authenticatong?

replies.body: Are you still having problems getting signed it? Most of the time players can update their DNS and Port Forward settings under their network settings to try and get a much smoother connection to our servers specifically so give that a try. if you're not sure how to update those, check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
Same here but on euw , no ranked games for me i guess r.i.p rewards
